name: dryingLevel_increase
description: This function is used to increase the drying level in a dryer.

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: The location where the device is located.

parameters.name: room
parameters.description: The room where the device is located.

parameters.name: device
parameters.description: The name or type of the device to increase the drying level.

parameters.name: predefinedCompartment
parameters.description: The predefined compartment to increase the drying level.

parameters.name: dryingLevelDelta
parameters.description: The amount by which to increase the drying level.
